channel.title: Fractional ISDN PRI on 0x000216

item.title: Fractional ISDN PRI For Telephone Savings
item.description: ISDN PRI is a great option for businesses that need a robust phone system. It provides 23 digital lines with features like fast call switching and Caller ID on a single, cost-effective line. However, not all businesses need that many lines. Smaller businesses or those with lower call volumes can opt for Fractional ISDN PRI, which offers the same features but with fewer lines. This option allows businesses to customize the number of lines they need, typically around 12, leading to significant cost savings.
